localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
blogPost.body: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)
blogPost.title: Firework Web Story Platform - B2B Version of TikTok
blogPost.author: Vincent Yang

previous.excerpt: Sleep Formula is your personal sleep assistant that counts your sleep cycles and tracks your sleep. Wake up bright-eyed and bushy-tailed at ANY time even if you stay up late! Analyze your sleep and build healthy habits! Let's do it together!
previous.title: Sleep Formula - App to improve your sleep using CBT & sleep tracker
